      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activatePlayer(Player p)
      Method which activates a player; this means the player goes from "players" to "active players" Useful when a players reconnects to the game
      void deactivatePlayer(Player p)
      Method which deactivates a player; this means that the player goes from "active players" to "players" Useful when a players disconnect from the game

      Method which returns the active players, aka the ones still online and playing

      • deactivatePlayer

        public void deactivatePlayer(Player p)
        Method which deactivates a player; this means that the player goes from "active players" to "players" Useful when a players disconnect from the game
        Parameters:
        p - player to be deactivated
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if p is not active or present in the match

      • activatePlayer

        public void activatePlayer(Player p)
        Method which activates a player; this means the player goes from "players" to "active players" Useful when a players reconnects to the game
        Parameters:
        p - player to be activated
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the player is already activated or not present in the match
